tool.name: File Format Identification

param.name: input1
param.label: ZIP containing the files to be analysed

tool.help:
Do you have a huge number of multimedia files and you don't know if they are corrupt, or if they have the correct extension? This tool
- gives you an overview of what file types there are - checks if there are any hidden duplicates - checks if the extension of the files match their content - checks if the content of the files is uncorrupted
A possible use case are digital preservation workflows, where you want to make sure that you only preserve high-quality files for the future.
